doctor.workplace: Anwer Khan Modern Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Syed Khairul Amin is a Pediatric Hematologist in Dhaka. His qualification is MBBS, DCH (Glasgow), MRCP (UK), FRCP (Edin), FRCP (Glasgow). He is a Professor & Head, Pediatrics at Anwer Khan Modern Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Anwer Khan Modern Medical College Hospital. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Syed Khairul Amin at Anwer Khan Modern Medical College Hospital is 9am to 1pm & 5pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. A.K.M. Amirul Morshed (Khasru)
doctor.degree: MBBS, DCM, DCH, MCPS, MD (Pediatrics) MD (Pediatric Hematology)
doctor.specialty: Child Disease, Child Cancer & Child Blood Disease Specialist
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. A.K.M. Amirul Morshed (Khasru) is a highly experienced specialist in child diseases, pediatric cancer, and blood disorders in children. With an MBBS, DCM, DCH, MCPS, and MD in Pediatrics as well as Pediatric Hematology, he has dedicated his career to diagnosing and treating complex conditions such as leukemia, thalassemia, hemophilia, and other childhood blood disorders. As a former Professor of Pediatric Hematology at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital, his expertise in pediatric oncology and hematology is widely recognized. He currently consults at Digilab Medical Services Ltd in Mirpur, Dhaka, where he provides specialized care for young patients. To book an appointment, visit his chamber at House-146, Road-02, Block-A, Section-12, Mirpur, Dhaka, during his visiting hours from 10 AM to 12:30 PM (closed on Thursdays and Fridays).

chamber.address: House # 146, Road # 02, Block # B, Pallabi, Mirpur-12, Dhaka
